SELECT MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_CODE , IS_ADMIN FROM studyroom_member
WHERE ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY MEMBER_CODE DESC
